info.description: Api for Depeche social network. VK Education project. Spring, 2023
info.title: Depeche API

get.description: Get user's new feed part by last post id and batch size.

parameters.description: Date and time of last post given. If not specified the newest posts will be sent
parameters.name: last_post_date

get.description: User can check if chat with that user_link exists
Get messages batch by chatID sorted by date

post.description: Add message to db and send it to listeners

get.description: User can get community's posts in includes batches older than specified in "last_post_date"

parameters.description: ID of the community on whose wall the post is located
parameters.name: community_link

parameters.description: Date and time of last post given. If not specified the newest posts will be sent
parameters.name: last_post_date

get.description: User can get post by id, returned by server from CreatePost handler

parameters.description: Date and time of last post given. If not specified the newest posts will be sent
parameters.name: last_post_date

get.description: User can get user's posts in includes batches older than specified in "last_post_date"

parameters.description: ID of the user on whose wall the post is located
parameters.name: owner_link

parameters.description: Date and time of last post given. If not specified the newest posts will be sent
parameters.name: last_post_date

delete.description: Users can delete file on server

get.description: Users can read file on server

post.description: Users can upload many files using multipart/form-data

parameters.description: Link to user to reject friend request.
parameters.name: request

get.description: Get subscribes or subscribers for requested user

post.description: Delete user session and invalidate session cookie
Authorize client with credentials (login and password).
Register client with credentials and other user info.
